Name: 't Markerhuisje

Name: 't Markerhuisje
Review Text: good cook, delicious food, cute little restaurant. also outside is nice, you can sit on the waterside. There is one cook and one waitress so in rush hour you might need to wait a little but that is part of the fun. Price is amazing, for 25 euro a very well cooked and frshly made 3 course meal!
